docs.snippet: Uruguay midfielder Nicolas Lodeiro was forced to postpone his long-awaited Corinthians debut after injuring himself with a soap dish, while Fred made an uneventful return for Fluminense in the Brazilian championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay midfielder Nicolas Lodeiro was forced to postpone his long-awaited Corinthians debut after injuring himself with a soap dish, while Fred made an uneventful return for Fluminense in the Brazilian championship.

headline.main: Lodeiro Debut Postponed by Falling Soap Dish
headline.print_headline: Lodeiro Debut Postponed by Falling Soap Dish

docs.snippet: FIFA banned former Greece coach Fernando Santos for eight international games on Monday for verbally abusing match officials at the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA banned former Greece coach Fernando Santos for eight international games on Monday for verbally abusing match officials at the World Cup.

headline.main: Former Greece Coach Barred Eight Games for Conduct at World Cup
headline.print_headline: FIFA Bans Former Greece Coach Santos for 8 Matches

docs.snippet: Former Greece coach Fernando Santos has been banned for eight competitive international matches after he was sent off at the end of the World Cup match against Costa Rica, FIFA said on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Greece coach Fernando Santos has been banned for eight competitive international matches after he was sent off at the end of the World Cup match against Costa Rica, FIFA said on Monday.

headline.main: Former Greece Coach Santos Banned for Eight Games
headline.print_headline: Former Greece Coach Santos Banned for Eight Games

docs.snippet: India has dealt a potentially fatal blow to the World Trade Organization's hopes of modernizing the rules of global commerce and remaining the central forum for multilateral trade deals.
docs.lead_paragraph: India has dealt a potentially fatal blow to the World Trade Organization's hopes of modernizing the rules of global commerce and remaining the central forum for multilateral trade deals.

headline.main: WTO Failure Points to Fragmented Future for Global Trade
headline.print_headline: WTO Failure Points to Fragmented Future for Global Trade

docs.snippet: A Guantanamo Bay prisoner from Syria cleared for release in 2009 has seen his health deteriorate amid a hunger strike and needs urgent, independent medical examination, his attorney said Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Guantanamo Bay prisoner from Syria cleared for release in 2009 has seen his health deteriorate amid a hunger strike and needs urgent, independent medical examination, his attorney said Tuesday.

headline.main: Attorney: Force-Fed Gitmo Prisoner's Life at Risk
headline.print_headline: Attorney: Force-Fed Gitmo Prisoner's Life at Risk

docs.snippet: The interruption the World Cup forced on the Libertadores Cup means that San Lorenzo may be without attacking midfielder Ignacio Piatti for the second leg of the final against Nacional of Paraguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: The interruption the World Cup forced on the Libertadores Cup means that San Lorenzo may be without attacking midfielder Ignacio Piatti for the second leg of the final against Nacional of Paraguay.

headline.main: Saints Fight to Keep Midfielder Piatti for Final
headline.print_headline: Saints Fight to Keep Midfielder Piatti for Final

docs.snippet: Uruguay play Japan and South Korea on a tour of Asia in September, when they will not be able to pick disgraced striker Luis Suarez, the Uruguayan FA (AUF) said on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay play Japan and South Korea on a tour of Asia in September, when they will not be able to pick disgraced striker Luis Suarez, the Uruguayan FA (AUF) said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Uruguay to Meet Japan, Korea on Asian Tour in September
headline.print_headline: Uruguay to Meet Japan, Korea on Asian Tour in September

docs.snippet: Former Iraq and Jordan coach Adnan Hamad will lead Bahrain to next year's Asian Cup in Australia after he was appointed as the replacement for Englishman Anthony Hudson.
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Iraq and Jordan coach Adnan Hamad will lead Bahrain to next year's Asian Cup in Australia after he was appointed as the replacement for Englishman Anthony Hudson.

headline.main: Hamad Appointed to Coach Bahrain at Asian Cup
headline.print_headline: Hamad Appointed to Coach Bahrain at Asian Cup

docs.snippet: Luis Segura has been confirmed as president of the Argentine Football Association until October 2015 following the death of Julio Grondona, the AFA said on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Luis Segura has been confirmed as president of the Argentine Football Association until October 2015 following the death of Julio Grondona, the AFA said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Segura Ratified as AFA Chief for Rest of Grondona Term
headline.print_headline: Segura Ratified as AFA Chief for Rest of Grondona Term

docs.snippet: Bert van Marwijk, who led the Netherlands to the 2010 World Cup final, is interested in taking over as coach of South Korea's national team and negotiations are set to conclude next week, the head of the KFA's technical committee said on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Bert van Marwijk, who led the Netherlands to the 2010 World Cup final, is interested in taking over as coach of South Korea's national team and negotiations are set to conclude next week, the head of the KFA's technical committee said on Thursday.

headline.main: South Korea Await Van Marwijk Decision on Coaching Job
headline.print_headline: South Korea Await Van Marwijk Decision on Coaching Job
